title: Wedding Invite Font
content:
Hi All,

I've scoured the internet trying to ID this font.

Does anyone have an idea?

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210020451im_/http:/typophile.com/files/custom-wedding-invitation-blush-pink-grey-white-lace_6706.jpg)
author: prplepear28

comments.content: I can't find your font either, but you may like something similar like **[Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210020451/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/sudtipos/affair_regular_ot/)** by Alejandro Paul (Sudtipos, 2006)

Some more options.  
Parfumerie Script  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/parfumerie-script-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210020451/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/parfumerie-script-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesenses/parfumerie-script-pro/")  
Parfait Script Pro  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/parfait-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210020451/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/parfait-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/argentina-lian-types/parfait-script/")  
Bickham Script  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131210020451/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/bickham-script-mm/")  
Check the alternate glyphs for really swirly letters.  
Don

Duplicate. Server wheel of fortune...  
Don
